definition: to leak/to divulge/to leave out by mistake/waterclock or hourglass (old)
cave/hole/zero (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers)/CL:個|个[ge4]
(of an argument, theory etc) full of flaws (idiom)

sentences.english: Can web vulnerability scanners help you remediate the vulnerability?
sentences.chinese: Web漏洞掃描器能幫助我們修補漏洞嗎？

sentences.english: Can web vulnerability scanners help you remediate the vulnerability?
sentences.chinese: Web漏洞掃描器能幫助我們修補漏洞嗎？

sentences.english: The water ran for hours before the leak was found.
sentences.chinese: 漏洞發現之前，水已流了數小時。

sentences.english: Its authors had detailed knowledge of Siemens’ software and its security weaknesses.
sentences.chinese: 筆者已經詳細的瞭解了西門子軟件的安全漏洞在哪裏。

sentences.english: Mill recognized two failings in Bentham’s earlier theory.
sentences.chinese: 穆勒認識到邊沁早期的理論中有兩個漏洞。

sentences.english: Your goal is to mitigate the risks of exploiting vulnerabilities to an acceptable level.
sentences.chinese: 您的目標是將漏洞被利用的風險減輕到可接受的程度。

sentences.english: After seeing how vulnerable these scripts are to hackings and holes.
sentences.chinese: 在看出這些腳本對黑客和漏洞是多麼脆弱之後。

sentences.english: In the meantime, criminal hackers may try to exploit the flaw to commit cybercrimes.
sentences.chinese: 在這個期間，黑客有可能夠利用漏洞進行網絡犯罪。

sentences.english: What aresuperstitions? They are patches for the holes and defects of our knowledge and view.
sentences.chinese: 甚麼是迷信？我們知識與見解中的漏洞與不足的補丁。

sentences.english: You won't find these bugs in your handout, right?
sentences.chinese: 你在你們的講義上找不到漏洞對嗎？

sentences.english: Hackers have already attacked several European Web sites using the unpatched exploit.
sentences.chinese: 該漏洞尚爲被修補，黑客已乘機攻擊了數個歐洲網站。

sentences.english: A move to fiscal union is [a closing] of this loophole.
sentences.chinese: 朝着財政聯盟的推進是一種堵住這一漏洞的做法。

sentences.english: What holes do you see in the research?
sentences.chinese: 你看到在研究中還有那些漏洞？

sentences.english: It cannot defend against vulnerabilities in third-party scripts or servers.
sentences.chinese: 它不能抵禦第三方腳本或服務器中的安全漏洞。

sentences.english: A good example of this is the clickjacking exploit.
sentences.chinese: 一個好的例子是點擊劫持漏洞利用。

sentences.english: Secondly, the introduction of land value increment tax.
sentences.chinese: 鑽井政策“漏洞”，不及時清算土地增值稅。

definition: to slip/to overlook by negligence/careless omission/oversight
(of an argument, theory etc) full of flaws (idiom)
a danger concealed within sth/hidden damage/misfortune not visible from the surface
short stave of the barrel (which allows the contents to escape)/(fig.) shortcoming/weak point
